# SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy.immediate

**Case**

Load the node’s external content immediately when the reference node is unarchived.

## Declaration

```swift
case immediate
```

## Constants

- **SCNReferenceLoadingPolicy.onDemand**: Load the node’s external comment only when the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNReferenceNode/load()] method is called.

items.description: Load the node’s external comment only when the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNReferenceNode/load()] method is called.
